00052 class Color {
00053 public:
00054 
00055    Color( int32 red, int32 green, int32 blue ):
00056       m_red( red ), m_green( green ), m_blue( blue ),
00057       m_pixelValue( ( ( red & 0xFF ) << 16 ) |
00058                     ( ( green & 0xFF ) << 8 ) |
00059                     ( blue & 0xFF ) ) 
00060    { }
00061 
00062    explicit Color( uint32 value = 0 ):
00063       m_red( ( value & 0xFF0000) >> 16 ),
00064       m_green( ( value & 0x00FF00 ) >> 8 ),
00065       m_blue( value & 0x0000FF ),
00066       m_pixelValue( value ) {
00067       
00068    }
00069    
00070    int32 getRed() const { return m_red; }
00071    int32 getBlue() const { return m_blue; }
00072    int32 getGreen() const { return m_green; }
00073    int32 getValue() const { return m_pixelValue; }
00074 private:
00075    int32 m_red;
00076    int32 m_green;
00077    int32 m_blue;
00078    int32 m_pixelValue;
00079 
00080 };

00092       LINE_CAP_ROUND,

00094    };
00095

00102       LINE_JOIN_ROUND 
00103    };
